mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( periodStart, periodEnd, personnel, companyName, detail, checkInfo, provideType, price, boardFile, category, customerId) VALUES (#{periodStart}, #{periodEnd}, #{personnel}, #{companyName}, #{detail}, #{checkInfo}, #{provideType}, #{price}, #{boardFile}, #{category}, #{customerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE board b INNER JOIN customer c ON b.customerId = c.customerId SET b.periodStart=#{periodStart}, b.periodEnd=#{periodEnd}, b.personnel=#{personnel}, b.detail=#{detail}, b.checkInfo=#{checkInfo}, b.price=#{price}, b.boardFile=#{boardFile}, b.category=#{category}, b.customerId=#{customerId} WHERE b.boardId = #{boardId}
